main event: A farmer near Peru, Nebraska observed a bright, round or disc-shaped object that descended rapidly to an estimated 300-500 feet above the ground, hovered for a few seconds, and then ascended rapidly to an estimated 15,000 feet before disappearing.
interesting points: The object was described as being bright in appearance and silent in operation.
The sighting occurred on December 3, 1951 at approximately 2:20 AM.
The witness was alone at the time of the sighting.
The sighting is considered to be of interest to the Counter Intelligence Division of the Air Force.
Another report from May 29, 1952 describes a strange object observed near Nebraska City, Nebraska, but it was concluded to be a common meteorological phenomenon.
sighted object: a bright, round or disc-shaped object
